titleStmt.title: A charge against the Jews, and the Christian world, for not coming to Christ, who would have freely given them eternall life. Delivered in a sermon, before the Right Honorable the House of Peers, in the Abbey Church at Westminster, on May 26. 1647. being the day of their publick fast. / By Thomas Valentine, one of the Assembly of Divines, and Minister of Chalfont in the County of Bucks.
titleStmt.author: Valentine, Thomas, 1585 or 6-1665?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for John Rothwell at the Sun and Fountain in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
